title: Hex- The Light Speed.
body:
Hex is a champion with Great mobility and ganking properties with his ultimate. He is Great champion for Top or Jungle. 

HP 493+78 4.4/5sec +0.75
MP 345 +58 3.7/5sec +0.57
AD 54+3.88
Atk Speed 0.765+0.012
Armor 21+1.88
MR 30+0
Speed 355

Passive: Wondering Killer
After 9 seconds out of combat. Gains 9 Speed/sec for 10 sec. Reaching 90 he enters stealth if he is not under vision of enemies. (Wards, minions, champions .etc) That stealth lasts until attacking or hitting an enemy with a spell.  This speed lasts 3.5 sec in combat before going on cooldown.
As well as that: After Killing a champion your next movement command within 475/550/625/700 units will cause hex to dash there as well as entering stealth for 1/1.75/2.5/3.25 sec as well as 50% speed boost for the duration.

Q Rebound Slash 80/88/96/104/112 MP 13/12.5/12/11.5/11 sec
Can be cast normally or next to a wall with bonus effects. By moving mouse towards a wall within 500 units he will bounce there and rebound to the opposite side. (Like a 90 degree angle away) 
Normal Cast:  500 range
 Jumps to an enemy dealing 20/40/80/160/320 +5/15/30/50/75%AD as Physical Damage and 20% Movement speed as TD.
Wall cast: After jumping off the wall he creates 3 clones to hit 4 enemies dealing 40/80/160/320/480 +40/50/60/70/80% AD as Physical Damage and 20% Speed as TD and mini-stuns them for 0.1/0.15/0.2/0.25/0.3 sec. Slowing them by 10% an gaining 10% Speed for 4 sec.
Bouncing off the wall reduces CD by 70%

W Perish Song 100mp 32/30.25/28.5/26.75/25sec
Hex sings a song of Death to nearby enemies over 1.25 sec. Enemies that hear this song are eligible for Perish stacks by the attacks of Hex for 7 seconds. (Not a channel but silence can be applied to cancel this move and only silence)
Perish: Basic attacks or Rebound Slash applies 1 out of 6 stacks. Upon reaching 6 stacks, they perish if they are a minion or monster (Epic excluded)
If it is a champion, They lose 2/2.5/3/3.5/4% Max hp as Physical damage every second for 5 seconds As well as 20% Movement speed every second until they have 0 movement speed, then stunning for 1 second after the effect. However on the other hand. If Hex is successful in applying max stacks to any enemy, he heals 2/2.5/3/3.5/4% Max hp per sec for 5 sec and gains 10% Movement speed per sec for 5 seconds and doubled to 100% for 1 sec after the duration.

E Execution 70/75/80/85/90 mp 18/17.5/17/16.5/16 sec.
Marks an enemy for execution after 1 sec of casting. Auto attacking them within 3.75 sec of cast will root the enemy in place for 1 sec while dealing massive damage to it. Deals 40/70/100/130/160 damage + Speed and 30% AD. Damage is increased by 2% for every 4 BONUS speed HEX has (From masteries, Runes or items) Up to 100% more damage. (80/140/200/260/320 + 2x Movement speed and 60% AD.

R EXTREME SPEED 75MP 160/120/80 sec
Passive: Hex gains 5/7.5% of his Movement speed as Physical Damage 
Active: Hex Channels for 1.25 sec before entering Hyper Speed, Gaining 100/175 Movement speed, Immune to all immobilizes and disables as well as moving through units. Lasts 10 seconds. After that, the movements speed fades quickly over 1/1.75/ seconds. (Loses 10 speed every o.1 seconds. How every after this Hex is very tired and loses his Ultimate passive during the first half of his ult cooldown and is slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
Once Extreme speed hits Rank 3, it powers up. 
The Passive damage gain is 15%, The Channel is reduced to 0.75 sec. Speed gain is now 350. Lasts 14 sec. Speed fades over 7 sec (Loses 5 Speed over 0.1 sec.) He gets back to shape faster and only loses passive for the first fifth of his ultimate's cooldown and slow is reduced to 15% for 1 sec.
